reviewText: Caveat Emptor! Despite this being advertised as:"All men are brothers 11 DVD /China movie and production / English subtitle", there are no English sub-titles and you only receive some of the episodes (there are 86 in all but you only receive half a dozen. A mega rip=off if ever there was one! So, unless you speak Mandarin - forget it. This is NOT what it is advertised as. Shame on Amazon!!!!All Men Are Brothers / Shui Hu Chuan
This is a bootleg edition of 20 episodes and no English Subtitles. I was lucky my seller was honest and respectful and did a fast even exchange. DO NOT BUY! I cant go Lower than 1 star or I would.
